page.title: 19CUSTOMS CONTINUED
page.content: There were prizes for 1st girl/boy, they get a medsl, and second and third get a certificate. The other finalists in the other age groups get the same. There were also prizes for the winning photographs in each category. On Sunday there was {DUCK {RACE}in aid of Muscular Dystrophy which went from Allanbank Hotel to a bit of the Allan Water. There was a prize for the first child's duck and for the first adult's duck, also second and third prizes. Sometimes it rains on Gala Day but it doesn't really matter. All the village join in the fun of {BRACO GALA WEEK!
